mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.title as name, c.suggestion, tp.icon, th.title, th.nick_name FROM tb_curriculum c JOIN (SELECT id FROM tb_curriculum_sales ORDER BY buyers DESC LIMIT 1) t ON c.id=t.id JOIN tb_curriculum_type tp ON tp.id=c.type_id JOIN tb_curriculum_teacher cth ON c.id=cth.curriculum_id JOIN tb_teacher th ON cth.teacher_id=th.id

SELECT c.id, c.title as name, c.learning_cycle, c.tag, tp.icon, th.title, th.nick_name FROM tb_curriculum c JOIN tb_curriculum_type tp ON tp.id=c.type_id JOIN tb_curriculum_teacher cth ON c.id=cth.curriculum_id JOIN tb_teacher th ON cth.teacher_id=th.id WHERE c.difficulty=#{difficulty} AND c.state='上线' ORDER BY c.id DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT c.title, c.price, c.current_price, s.buyers, s.rating, s.comment, c.video_num, c.document_num FROM tb_curriculum c JOIN tb_curriculum_sales s ON c.id=s.curriculum_id WHERE c.id=#{id}
